title: Live coverage: SpaceX to launch 23 Starlink satellites on Falcon 9 launch from Cape Canaveral
summary: The Starlink 12-15 mission is SpaceX’s 60th Falcon 9 launch of 2025. Liftoff from Space Launch Complex 40 at Cape Canaveral Space Force Station is targeting 11:58 p.m. EDT (0358 UTC).

title: Department of the Air Force issues draft documents for new SpaceX launch site at Vandenberg Space Force Base
summary: The proposal would allow SpaceX to take over Space Launch Complex 6, United Launch Alliance’s former Delta 4 launch site, and convert it for use to launch both Falcon 9 and Falcon Heavy rockets.

title: NASA’s Perseverance Mars Rover to Take Bite Out of ‘Krokodillen’
summary: Scientists expect the new area of interest on the lower slope of Jezero Crater’s rim to offer up some of the oldest rocks on the Red Planet.
